title: q17
prompt: (17) Which of these sentences would provide the best opening sentence for this report?
description: Read through the draft of a report about writer Charlotte Perkins Gilman. Then go on to the suggestions for revision that follow.
feedback: The correct answer is “Charlotte Perkins Gilman was an influential feminist and writer who affected ideas about the role of women in society.” It establishes who Charlotte Perkins Gilman was and why she was important. The sentence “While many feminist women influenced the role of women in society today, Charlotte Perkins Gilman is unique.” doesn’t tell why Charlotte Perkins Gilman was important or unique. The sentence “It is important to remember important women in history.” doesn’t talk about Gilman at all. The sentence “Charlotte Perkins Gilman was a woman who lived in the 1800s and 1900s, and who is often remembered as the writer of a short story.” doesn’t give the most important information about Gilman.
